title: Sampler, 1801–50
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Counted stitches.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Scattered motifs including a dog under a tree, flowers and eastern potentate with servant. Irregular shape and hemmed on four sides.
